name: Nominal cell capacity [A.h]
label: Nominal cell capacity
description: Rated capacity of the cell at nominal conditions.

name: Negative electrode thickness [m]
label: Negative electrode thickness
description: Thickness of the negative electrode domain.

name: Particle radius distribution
label: Particle radius distribution
description: Distribution model used for particle sizes.

name: Surface area to volume ratio [m-1]
label: Surface area to volume ratio
description: Specific surface area of active material particles.

name: Enable side reactions
label: Enable side reactions
description: Include solid-electrolyte interphase side reactions in the simulation.
